description:
Marilyn Flame is a beautiful female thief that was trying to capture Diancie. Ninja Riot didn`t think she was a trendy bandit and called her a talkative bandit. She ended up getting turned to stone with Ninja Riot by Yveltal but was later healed by Xerneas.
In the movie credits, she is seen being proposed to Ninja Riot.
name: Marilyn Flame
